column2: "Mutation is such a beautiful word. Rare is also a splendid word. Don't you think so?"
"Mutation is such a beautiful word. Rare is also a splendid word. Don't you think so?"
"Mutation is such a beautiful word. Rare is also a splendid word. Don't you think so?"
"Mutation is such a beautiful word. Rare is also a splendid word. Don't you think so?"
"Mutation is such a beautiful word. Rare is also a splendid word. Don't you think so?"
"Mutation is such a beautiful word. Rare is also a splendid word. Don't you think so?"
"Why are the rare species born? If you think about it, shouldn't there be some single change to the ecosystem that we can find?"
"But it's too early to draw conclusions yet. This is such a multifaceted issue."
"Why are the rare species born? If you think about it, shouldn't there be some single change to the ecosystem that we can find?"
"But it's too early to draw conclusions yet. This is such a multifaceted issue."
"Why are the rare species born? If you think about it, shouldn't there be some single change to the ecosystem that we can find?"
"Or at least, that's what we'd like to think. We still haven't figured out why. It's a pretty complex issue."

"Or at least, that's what we'd like to think. We still haven't figured out why. It's a pretty complex issue."
"Why are the rare species born? If you think about it, shouldn't there be some single change to the ecosystem that we can find?"
"Or at least, that's what we'd like to think. We still haven't figured out why. It's a pretty complex issue."
"Rare species and normal species. Which happened first and which happened afterwards?"
"The normal species multiplied, and was the numbers thin out? Are the numbers smaller as they're a derivation from the original?"
"Rare species and normal species. Which happened first and which happened afterwards?"
"The normal species multiplied, and was the numbers thin out? Are the numbers smaller as they're a derivation from the original?"
"Rare species and normal species. Which happened first and which happened afterwards?"
"The normal species multiplied, and was the numbers thin out? Are the numbers smaller as they're a derivation from the original?"

"環境の変化によって
通常種から希少種が生まれるのか。"

"それとも環境に適応するために
希少種から通常種が生まれたのか。
どちらが先なのだろうか……"

"環境の変化によって
通常種から希少種が生まれるのか。
それとも、逆なのか……"

"二年の時を経ても、いまだに不明。
だからこそ、調べがいがある。"

"環境の変化によって
通常種から希少種が生まれるのか
それとも、逆なのか……"

"継続的に調査を行っているが
その仔細はいまだに不明。
だからこそ、調べがいがある。"

"環境の変化によって
通常種から希少種が生まれるのか。
それとも、逆なのか……"

"継続的に調べていても
その仔細はいまだに不明。
だからこそ、調べがいがある。"
